definition: to gin cotton (separate seeds from fiber)
to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle
generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton

sentences.english: Makueni is one of only four modern ginneries in the country.
sentences.chinese: Makueni是全國僅有的四家現代化軋棉廠之一。

sentences.english: Was it how you invented the cotton gin?
